metadata.title: CVE-2018-20662 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description: In Poppler 0.72.0, PDFDoc::setup in PDFDoc.cc allows attackers to cause adenial-of-service (application crash caused by Object.h SIGABRT, because ofa wrong return value from PDFDoc::setup) by crafting a PDF file in which anxref data structure is mishandled during extractPDFSubtype processing.

criterions.comment: poppler: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
